content: The charitable objects of the organization are to educate the public in arts and sustainable conservation of the environment and endangered species, with a focus on arts such as music, drama, poetry reading, sculpture, painting, handicrafts, and all other associated arts. The charity seeks to encourage the public to participate in these arts by presenting concerts, performances, exhibitions, and other necessary items for better performance during festival periods and at other times as occasions arise. The ultimate goal is to promote environmental sustainability through the arts and raise awareness of endangered species and the importance of conservation efforts.
